    About Our Research

    The Artificial Intelligence Laboratory at RITEH focuses on cutting-edge research in artificial intelligence with emphasis on:

    • Medical Image Analysis: Machine learning techniques for illness and injury detection in medical images, particularly in radiology
    • Computer Vision: Digital analysis and classification of visual signals, hyperspectral image analysis
    • Deep Learning Applications: Development of foundation models and neural networks for various applications
    • Smart Systems: AI-powered solutions for hospitality, autonomous systems, and real-world deployments

    We collaborate with international research institutions and industry partners, translating fundamental research into practical applications that benefit healthcare, tourism, and other sectors.

    Featured Projects

    OPTIDERM

    Optical Diagnostics of Dermal Infections - bilateral research project (Croatia-Slovenia, 2023-2027)

    Learn More

    RadiologyNET

    Machine Learning for Knowledge Transfer in Medical Radiology (Croatian Science Foundation, 2021-2024)

    TSAAI
